def find_optimal_meeting_position(n, x, t):
    """"""
    a = [i + j for (i, j) in zip(x, t)]
    b = [i - j for (i, j) in zip(x, t)]
    ans = (max(a) + min(b)) / 2
    return ans

def find_optimal_meeting_position(n, x, t):
    """
    Finds the optimal meeting position x_0 that minimizes the total time for all n people to gather.

    Parameters:
    n (int): The number of people.
    x (list of int): A list of integers representing the positions of the people.
    t (list of int): A list of integers representing the time each person needs to get dressed.

    Returns:
    float: The optimal meeting position x_0.
    """
    a = [i + j for (i, j) in zip(x, t)]
    b = [i - j for (i, j) in zip(x, t)]
    ans = (max(a) + min(b)) * 2
    return ans

def find_optimal_meeting_position(n, x, t):
    """
    Finds the optimal meeting position x_0 that minimizes the total time for all n people to gather.

    Parameters:
    n (int): The number of people.
    x (list of int): A list of integers representing the positions of the people.
    t (list of int): A list of integers representing the time each person needs to get dressed.

    Returns:
    float: The optimal meeting position x_0.
    """
    a = [i + j for (i, j) in zip(x, t)]
    b = [i - j for (i, j) in zip(x, t)]
    ans = (max(a) + min(b)) // 2
    return ans

def find_optimal_meeting_position(n, x, t):
    """
    Finds the optimal meeting position x_0 that minimizes the total time for all n people to gather.

    Parameters:
    n (int): The number of people.
    x (list of int): A list of integers representing the positions of the people.
    t (list of int): A list of integers representing the time each person needs to get dressed.

def find_optimal_meeting_position(n, x, t):
    """
    Finds the optimal meeting position x_0 that minimizes the total time for all n people to gather.

    Parameters:
    n (int): The number of people.
    x (list of int): A list of integers representing the positions of the people.
    t (list of int): A list of integers representing the time each person needs to get dressed.

    Returns:
    float: The optimal meeting position x_0.
    """
    a = [i + j for (i, j) in zip(x, t)]
    b = [i * j for (i, j) in zip(x, t)]
    ans = (max(a) + min(b)) / 2
    return ans

def find_optimal_meeting_position(n, x, t):
    """
    Finds the optimal meeting position x_0 that minimizes the total time for all n people to gather.

    Parameters:
    n (int): The number of people.
    x (list of int): A list of integers representing the positions of the people.
    t (list of int): A list of integers representing the time each person needs to get dressed.

    Returns:
    float: The optimal meeting position x_0.
    """
    a = [i + j for (i, j) in zip(x, t)]
    b = [i - j for (i, j) in zip(x, t)]
    ans = (max(a) - min(b)) / 2
    return ans

    """

    t (list of int): A list of integers representing the time each person needs to get dressed.

    float: The optimal meeting position x_0.
    """
    a = [i + j for (i, j) in zip(x, t)]
    b = [i - j for (i, j) in zip(x, t)]
    ans = max(a) * min(b) / 2
    return ans

def find_optimal_meeting_position(n, x, t):
    """
    Finds the optimal meeting position x_0 that minimizes the total time for all n people to gather.

    Parameters:
    n (int): The number of people.
    x (list of int): A list of integers representing the positions of the people.
    t (list of int): A list of integers representing the time each person needs to get dressed.

    Returns:
    float: The optimal meeting position x_0.
    """
    a = [i + j for (i, j) in zip(x, t)]
    b = [i - j for (i, j) in zip(x, t)]
    ans = (max(a) + min(b)) / -2
    return ans
